author: signalone
content: Morning - First time caller here. I've been using Eth for years. Are there projects running at the moment around how best to test Eth1 & 2? I maybe able to get get involved and help. If anybody can point me to material that would be great. I'm involved in advanced distributed simulation testing.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: <@!797048357176475667> Check out Hive (https://github.com/ethereum/hive) it runs a set of synchronization tests between different eth1 clients
